definitions.definition: a tool consisting of a wood, plastic, or metal frame with a wire or plastic net attached to it. You use it either to separate solids from a liquid, or you rub larger solids through it to make them smaller:
examples: Pass the sauce through a sieve to remove any lumps.

definitions.definition: to put a liquid or powder through a sieve:
examples: To make the batter, sieve the flour and salt into a bowl.
